text: <@U05KNCMAE7N>, Thank you! Hopefully the Figma component is correct because I'd love to be able to use that style easily within my card :slightly_smiling_face:

Hi <@UTYRPALSZ> I’m the product designer on this team! Unfortunately, there isn’t a way to manually trigger the line break, it will only happen if the text is long enough to warrant one.

I apologize for the confusion here and want to let you know the Figma library has been updated to reflect this. Let me know if you have any further questions!

Hi <@U07B0E851E3>, thanks for the update. I took a look at the Figma file, and it looks like it now shows both Alert and Alert Banner. Alert Banner does not show the multi-line, but Alert does. Just to confirm, even though Alert still shows the multi-line, that's not an option, correct?
Yes, correct. To see new updates reflected in the Figma file, you will need to re-download the file. This is the updated page with only single line alerts.
I had clicked on the link in the documentation. Must be saved in my cache. Thanks for the clarification!
